title: Elbow Grease

en: Sweetie, I've cleaned up after you every night these past two weeks.
You might be busy fooling around with your little pet project, but I'm not your servant! Step it up around here!
Helping out more will cost you precious work time, at least an hour a day. Do you really want to lose that?

yes_caption: Sorry, yep. I'll help out more.
no_caption: I can't. I don't have time for dust.

en: Thank you. We're a team. If we work together, we can both achieve the things we want to achieve.
I never wanted to be the person who has no time for themselves because they're swamped with housework. Thank you for understanding.
Oh yeah? We'll see how comfortable you are when you have to do everything yourself!
